content: adorn your boudoir chaise or coffin with thirteen ghostly guardians to invite sweet nightmares these bell-shaped specters are beginner-friendly and quick to crochet and they can be strung on a garland as pictured here or hung singly as ornaments in celebration of this october s friday the 13th download this pattern for free and finish the project just in time for halloween notes gauge number of ghosts and length of garland are suggestions only whatever your chosen yarn a slightly firm gauge is suggested to help the ghosts hold their shape consider using a hook one size smaller than suggested for the yarn
